pp_once_emu.h

00001 // Include in pp.h after platform definition to ensure that only one platform is defined
00002 // Only use for platforms which have an emulator.
00003 // Defines EMULATOR_BUILD if detected.
00004 // Uncomment pragma message() for debugging (or replace with #warning if your preprocessor does not support the pragma)
00005 
00006 // Verify that only one platform is defined
00007 #include <lang/pp_once.h>
00008 
00009 // Define EMULATOR_BUILD if detected
00010 // TODO: Edit conditions as necessary
00011 // Currently assumes all Windows builds to be for an emulator
00012 
00013 #if ( defined(WIN32) || defined(_WIN32) || defined(AEE_SIMULATOR) )
00014 //  #pragma message("Defined EMULATOR_BUILD")
00015     #define EMULATOR_BUILD
00016 #endif
00017
